short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to remove Spirit Airlines from Kayak.com Search Results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will detect if Kayak is showing Spirit Airlines in your search results and automatically un-check/hide those results.

This extension is in no way, shape or form affiliated with either Kayak or Spirit Airlines.
